I'd say if you already have it, play it, it's really good. But if you haven't purchased it, you're not missing out on anything, and it'd be easier to just purchase it in a Valve Complete Pack or something like it.

Amazing Puzzle Solving game with a good story and dialouge, play it all the way through!

One of the best games I have ever played, the voice acting is phenominal, the puzzl's are hard but fair. It has the best credit roll i've ever seen in a piece of media. I hope VALVe continues this series.

ABSO-F***ING-LUTELY. Great game in all aspects. Amazing dialogue, interactions, gameplay, comedy, single player and co-op; and so much more, including endless hours of play after you've beaten the campaign. You can create your own courses and submit them online; and play countless, insanely creative, challenging, fun, *different*, online custom courses. You can also see how fast your friends completed certain missions, try to beat them and speed run your way to a great time. You can also compete by trying to use less portals than other people to complete a mission. There's so much to do in this game, it's so fun, I've bought it on 2 different systems.

This game is amazing! Hell, It's better than amazing! It has great voice acting, great gameplay, amazing music, and some of the best level design. Story is very fun and can get you invested. I love this game and I got pretty sad when I beat it.

The Co-op is pretty fun and difficult. 

The community test chambers are fun you just need to find the good ones.

The achievements are fun to get.

The music is great to listen to.

The game is a 10/10. Buy it. It is well worth the price.
u should play with two player
One of my favorites to just go and play to solve puzzles since I can even play with a friend

This game feels like a new kind of puzzle game. The game mechanics are some of the most creative that I have ever seen, with every stage always introducing a new concept and requiring you to explore the physics and think creatively. Although this is a puzzle game, there is still a sense of purpose in everything you do, brought about by an engaging story with lovable characters. The atmosphere is one of the most immersive and engrossing that I have seen. The ending left my sentimental and wanting more.
Quite fun and interesting from the first game. 10/10
so great amazing plot 10/10 would recommend
